```{r setup}
#STEP I.
#Load relevant libraries
library(RCOMET)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(tidyr)
library(reshape2)
library(umap)
library(readxl)
library(Seurat)
library(phateR)
library(dtw)
library(pracma)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(plotly)
```


You are supposed to run this vignette after running the pipeline and having the files generated. Please use Command + shift + c on the code chunks and run them
